summary: REQ-48 is partially implemented: the Discover page companion card appears updated to “YouTubeMe.xyz” and opens https://YouTubeMe.xyz, and the Footer CTA label is updated. However, due to truncation and missing evidence, updates to the Discover “What’s New” list and the YouTubeMe informational page external link/copy cannot be fully verified, nor can we confirm there are zero remaining “YouTubeMe.co” references across the frontend. Additionally, two non-requested metadata/state files were modified.

missing_requirements.requirement: In the Discover page “What’s New” list, any mention of “YouTubeMe.co” is replaced with “YouTubeMe.xyz”.
missing_requirements.reason: The provided DiscoverPage diff is truncated before any “What’s New” section; no evidence shows the list exists or was updated.

missing_requirements.requirement: On the YouTubeMe informational page, the heading and all body copy refer to “YouTubeMe.xyz” and the external link points to https://YouTubeMe.xyz.
missing_requirements.reason: The YouTubeMePage diff is truncated and does not show the external link (or its href), and not all body copy is visible to confirm every reference was updated.

missing_requirements.requirement: No remaining user-visible text in the frontend references “YouTubeMe.co”.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff only shows snippets of a few files; there is insufficient evidence to conclude the entire frontend has no remaining “YouTubeMe.co” references.

hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks for UI text/link rename in the frontend; modifying summary/metadata files is not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated project state tracking file with rename summary mention.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest is limited to UI copy/link updates and explicitly avoids broader changes; editing project_state.json is not requested.
